projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Carousel Feed
projects.description: Revamped Carousell's main feed by migrating from MVP to MVVM architecture with Jetpack Compose and Kotlin. Improved UI performance, resulting in a 25% increase in impressions per user.

projects.title: Trust badge
projects.description: Developed a new feature displaying seller trustworthiness, leading to a 15% increase in transactions for sellers with the badge.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Describe your experience building RESTful APIs with Django REST Framework (DRF).
How have you optimized database queries in Django applications?
Explain your approach to implementing authentication and authorization in a Django-based API.
Describe your experience with Celery and message queues. What use cases have you implemented?
How do you approach writing unit and integration tests for backend APIs?
Explain your experience with PostgreSQL or Redis.
Describe a challenging bug you encountered while developing a backend application and how you resolved it.
How do you collaborate with DevOps teams for deployment and infrastructure management?
